participant_1.background:
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
i play in a nfl fantasy football league.
i own a german shepard.
i like movies based on comedies.
my favorite fruit is apple.

participant_2.background:
I spent a week in the Amazon Rainforest when I was younger, and it was the most amazing experience of my life.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.
I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts.
I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day.
i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.

content.text: Hi! I'm looking forward to getting to know you. What are your favorite things to do?
Hi! I love to read and write. I'm also a big fan of the outdoors and exploring new places.
That's great! I love to read and write too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Jane Austen or Charles Dickens. I also really enjoy reading about history and travel.
Awesome! I've never read any of those authors, but I've heard great things about them. I'm more of a fantasy and science fiction reader myself.
Oh, I love fantasy and science fiction too! What are some of your favorite books in those genres?
I love the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien. I also really enjoyed the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy series by Douglas Adams.
Those are both great series! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! They're so much fun to read.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to go hiking and camping. I also enjoy playing video games and watching movies.
That's great! I love to go hiking and camping too. I also enjoy playing video games, but I don't watch much TV.
That's cool! I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
